welcome_text: Welcome! Type 'help' to see what you can do.

worldmap.title: Gwynhaven - Back Gate
worldmap.description: You stand at the back entrance to the great town of Gwynhaven.
worldmap.here:
You're at the back gate of Gwynhaven, there's not much on this side of town.
You can hear the bustling of a busy town centre a short while away.
worldmap.n: Through the gates you see a thick forest, it took you months to get here.
worldmap.e: To the east, you can see the north side of the town square.
worldmap.s: Turning to the south, you see the west side of the town square, there's a couple of tradesmen selling exotic goods from a far off land.
worldmap.w: To the west, the town walls tower over you. They're simple but effective.

worldmap.title: Gwynhaven - North Town Square
worldmap.description: The north side of the town square of Gwynhaven.
worldmap.here: The buildings around you get bigger as you get closer to the centre of the town. They're made from a cold, pale grey stone. There are a few stalls in the vicinity, a man with a quest catches your eye.
worldmap.n: To your north are the walls of this town, they're strong and old. You wonder what they were built to keep out.
worldmap.e: Looking to your east there's a narrow alley way. It leads away from the busy streets.
worldmap.s: To the south is the centre of town, it's busy and loud.
worldmap.w: To the west is the back gate of Gwynhaven. You think back to when you first caught glimpse of the wooden barricades through the trees.

worldmap.title: Gwynhaven - Narrow alley
worldmap.description: A narrow alley way that connects the town square with .
worldmap.here: The buildings tower over you, it's noticeably colder here. There's some beggars sleeping in doorways, they don't seem to be aware of you. There's a stick[0] on the wall.
worldmap.n: The north is blocked by buildings.
worldmap.e: The east carries a sense excitment, you can see the town thinning and the walls beyond.
worldmap.s: The south is blocked by buildings.
worldmap.w: Turning to the west there's the north side of the town centre.

worldmap.title: Gwynhaven - West Town Square
worldmap.description: A dense forest, older than the town of Gwynhaven.
worldmap.here: The ground moves as you walk over it, the air is thick with life.
worldmap.n: To the north you can see the town of Gwynhaven, the feeling of home gives you warmth.
worldmap.e: The east carries the forest further.
worldmap.s: The south is impassable, once again the black has caught up to you.
worldmap.w: Turning to the west you see the face of the void, it stares back.

worldmap.title: Gwynhaven - Town Square
worldmap.description: The outskirts of the Fargen Forest.
worldmap.here:
This place feels safe. There's a message board on the side of a hut, it has messages left by other travellers.
Taking a closer look there's also some job postings.
worldmap.n: Over the hill to the north you see the Forest Path, you're annoyed at how easy it was to walk.
worldmap.e: To the east there's a path lined with guards, they seem stiff.
worldmap.s: The south sees the world fall away into black, you turn away.
worldmap.w: Turning to the west you see the forest continue.
